chapter.title: Contact Us
chapter.para: If you have problems running FreeGuide, you should have a look at the FAQ at first. If that doesn't help, have a look at the already-asked questions on the FreeGuide Users mailing list. If you want contribute actively to the list, subscribe to the list by sending a mail to freeguide-tv-users@lists.sourceforge.net.
The developers can be found at freeguide-tv-devel@lists.sourceforge.net and the devel list archives.
